General.Name: Admiralty Resources NL
General.Description: Admiralty Resources NL explores for and develops mineral properties in Australia, Chile, and Hong Kong. The company explores for iron, lead, zinc, nickel, and cobalt deposits. Its flagship projects are the iron ore districts in Chile that comprise Harper South district covering an area of approximately 2,498 hectares located in the Atacama Region; the Pampa Tololo, which covers an area of 3,455 hectares; and the El Cojin that covers an area of 600 hectares. The company was incorporated in 1981 and is based in Millers Point, Australia.
General.Address: 24-26 Kent Street, Millers Point, NSW, Australia, 2000
